parameters.Name: Bounces
parameters.Description: Set the maximum number of light ray bounces

parameters.Name: Final
parameters.Description: Increases the quality of light_environment and indirect lighting by spending more time firing rays.

parameters.Name: Extra Sky
parameters.Description: Trace N times as many rays for indirect light and sky ambient.

parameters.Name: Lights
parameters.Description: Load a custom lights file in addition to lights.rad and map-specific lights file.

parameters.Name: Smooth
parameters.Description: Set the threshold for smoothing groups, in degrees.

parameters.Name: Luxel Density
parameters.Description: Scale down luxels. Maximum value is 1.

parameters.Name: Static Prop Lighting
parameters.Description: Generate per-vertex prop_static lighting; always enabled for light_spot entities. Disables info_lighting entities on props WITHOUT normal maps.

parameters.Name: Static Prop Polys
parameters.Description: Perform shadow tests of prop_statics at polygon precision.

parameters.Name: Texture Shadows
parameters.Description: Generates lightmap shadows from $translucent surfaces of models (NOT brushes)
